DESC_TEXT:
Hey, my name is **Betty**!

A powerful Discord music bot with functions like custom playlists, 24/7 mode, song request channel, and much more.

Cannot see can see my slash commands? [Re-invite]({{InviteURL}}) me and verify that @everyone has the **Use Application Commands** permissions!

Need Support? [discord.gg/ZVERh35]({{SupportURL}})
